titleStmt.title: A marriage triumphe Solemnized in an epithalamium, in memorie of the happie nuptials betwixt the high and mightie Prince Count Palatine. And the most excellent princesse the Lady Elizabeth. Written by Thomas Heywood.
titleStmt.author: Heywood, Thomas, d. 1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by N. Okes] for Edward Marchant, and are to be sold at his shoppe in Pauls Church-yard ouer against the Crosse,

notesStmt.note: The British Library copy has pi2r blank whereas most copies have dedication to Prince Frederick--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shoppe in Pauls Church-yard ouer against the Crosse
